name: Plunging Strike
description: Combat Action: Switch to the target character. That character then uses a Normal Attack.
descriptionraw: $[K1]: Switch to the target character. That character then uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: Switch to the target character. That character then uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>.
storytext: "...Don't deploy your Wind Glider halfway down! You'll get discovered!"
